page.title: 09BLAGDON SCHOOL JOURNEY 1985
page.content: In May 1985 we took a party of our children to{Duporth}near{St.Austell, {Cornwall}where we spent a week doing various activities like table tennis, learning how to abseil,how to fire a bow in archery,to understand the rules in crazy golf,how to fence in the proper way, using the foil, how to use a compass in the initiative tests, how to dribble with the ball in basketball and to shoot into the net.In our gymnastics we were taught how to do proper forward rolls and cartwheels. Other activities included swimming, beach studies, football and tennis.At night there were various things to do like watching videos, discos, concerts and beach parties. We had football, basketball and 'Superteams' competitions, organised as evening activities. It was great fun. I hope I will be able to go again next year!
